description: List all persons in a large person group, and retrieve person information (including personId, name, userData and persistedFaceIds of registered faces of the person).

large_person_group_id.description: Id referencing a particular large person group.

start.description: Starting person id to return (used to list a range of persons).

top.description: Number of persons to return starting with the person id indicated by the 'start' parameter.
